author: Chen Luning
title: MCC Singapore Wins the Bid for the Mandai Rainforest Park South Project
titleCN: 中冶新加坡成功中标新加坡万礼热带雨林公园项目
contentCN:
2020年1月13日，中冶新加坡成功中标新加坡万礼热带雨林公园项目。这是中冶新加坡继新加坡环球影城项目之后，参与的又一新加坡旅游行业的重大项目。

万礼热带雨林公园是万礼生态园的全新园区，毗邻新的飞禽公园、新加坡夜间动物园、新加坡动物园、河川生态园和生态度假村，共同形成完整的生态体验园，为公众和游客提供近距离接触自然的机会，以及悠闲娱乐的好去处。全面开放的万礼生态园，预计会对新加坡旅游业带来巨大的推动作用，每年的访客人数会增加一倍至1000万人次，并为新加坡创造更多就业机会。

十年前的2010年，中冶新加坡以令人惊叹的速度和质量完成了新加坡环球影城项目。十年后的今天，中冶新加坡再次勇挑重担，设计、施工总承包万礼热带雨林公园项目，充分显示出业界对于中冶新加坡在主题公园项目设计与承建实力的信任和认可。
content:
On January 13, 2020, MCC Singapore successfully won the bid for the Singapore Mandai Tropical Rainforest Park project. This is MCC Singapore's second major project relating to Singapore's tourism industry following the Universal Studios Singapore project.

The Mandai Rainforest Park is a new park in the Mandai Project, adjacent to the new Bird Park, Singapore Night Safari, Singapore Zoo, Singapore River Safari, and Mandai eco-resort, forming a complete eco-experience park and providing the public and tourists with opportunities to get closer to nature while also serving as a place for leisure and entertainment. The completed Mandai Project is expected to provide a major boost to Singapore's tourism industry, doubling the number of annual visitors to 10 million and creating more jobs in Singapore.

Ten years ago, in 2010, MCC Singapore completed the Universal Studios Singapore project with breath-taking speed and quality. Today, ten years later, MCC Singapore has once again taken on the responsibility of designing and constructing the Mandai Rainforest Park, demonstrating the industry's trust and recognition of MCC Singapore's strength in the design and construction of theme park projects.
